title: Hour 2 – Clarence Hill (07-08-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Clarence Hill (07-08-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Chris Broussard and Jason McIntyre are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss LeBron James’ mentality as the NBA prepares to restart the 2020 season. They question Cam Newton’s attitude and approach after signing with the Patriots. Cowboys reporter Clarence Hill joins the show to tell they guys why he believes Dak Prescott and the Cowboys will agree on a long term contract before next week’s deadline.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
